gems.name: hammer_cli_katello
gems.authors: Adam Price, Adam Ruzicka, Andrew Kofink, Brad Buckingham, Bryan Kearney, Chris Duryee, Chris Roberts, Christine Fouant, Daniel Lobato García, David Davis, Dustin Tsang, Eric D. Helms, Ivan Nečas, Jason L Connor, Jason Montleon, John Mitsch, Justin Sherrill, Lucy Fu, Martin Bačovský, Michaux Kelley, Og Maciel, Partha Aji, Pavel Moravec, Quinn James, Roman Plevka, Stephen Benjamin, Tomas Strachota, Tom McKay, Walden Raines, Zach Huntington-Meath
gems.info: Hammer-CLI-Katello is a plugin for Hammer to provide connectivity to a Katello server.
